channel.title: [PI] Adding Customs...Take a gander
channel.description: I know there are a billion guide out there but none of them helped me, so I'd get some Real help. I know that I need the Model's and to put them Client sided/Cache to the Raw folder. And then add the Int's to Itemdef.java. I've done this over 10 times with all different customs and NONE worked. It always comes out with errors or if it does go though the item looks nothing like its supposed to no matter what I do, can I get some assistance please? Please be VERY descriptive. -If you could get me Angel Wings model's and int's that would be GREATLY appreciated.

item.title: [PI] Adding Customs...Take a gander
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“K0y, post:2, topic:458115”]If it looks how it’s meant to in the modelling environment, then it’s your ints that are messed up. You’re better of asking someone in the model section that can look over them and tell you what’s wrong.[/quote]Thank you for being the only person to reply out of 4 different sites, could someone explain exactly what this means?:

case 13355: itemDef.modelid = 62693; itemDef.name = "Pernix cowl"; itemDef.description = "Pernix cowl"; itemDef.modelZoom = 800; itemDef.modelRotationY = 532; itemDef.modelRotationX = 14; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt165 = 62739; itemDef.anInt200 = 62756; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; itemDef.anInt175 = 62731; itemDef.anInt197 = 62727; break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding Customs...Take a gander
item.dc:creator: @K0y K0y
item.description:
@K0y wrote:

If it looks how it’s meant to in the modelling environment, then it’s your ints that are messed up. You’re better of asking someone in the model section that can look over them and tell you what’s wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding Customs...Take a gander
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

I know there are a billion guide out there but none of them helped me, so I’d get some Real help.
I know that I need the Model’s and to put them Client sided/Cache to the Raw folder.
And then add the Int’s to Itemdef.java.
I’ve done this over 10 times with all different customs and NONE worked. It always comes out with errors or if it does go though the item looks nothing like its supposed to no matter what I do, can I get some assistance please?
Please be VERY descriptive.
-If you could get me Angel Wings model’s and int’s that would be GREATLY appreciated.

Read full topic
